items.title: Golden Cross Alert: 3 Stocks With Serious Upside Potential

items.title: Big Beat, Bigger Plans: AEP Stock Powers Up on Data Center Boom
items.description: AEP stock jumps after a Q2 double beat, as data center-driven load growth fuels a $70B investment plan and supports its 3.28% dividend

items.title: UPS's 7.5% Dividend: A Blue-Chip Stock on a Once-in-a-Decade Sale
items.description: A market overreaction has pushed UPS stock to a multi-year low, creating a rare opportunity to capture a massive dividend yield from a blue-chip leade...

items.title: Why Byrna Could Be the Top Defense Stock to Watch Now
items.description: Down 20% year-to-date, "less-lethal" self-defense tool firm Byrna may be a defense play with massive growth potential that is trading at a bargain.

items.title: Why Bloom Energy Stock Could Break to New Highs
items.description: Bloom Energy stock has broken past previous highs recently, that doesn't mean a new ceiling can be made, a bet some are already making.
